com.scg.persistent

Class DbServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scg.persistent.DbServer

  • public final class DbServer
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for providing a programmatic interface to store and access objects in the database.
    Author:
    Russ Moul
